DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study verify safety assess tolerance long-term , implanted glucose monitoring sensor . The study also provide data characterize response property calibration implant sensor determine property vary implant duration .
DOC.criteria: Either : ( 1 ) male ( 2 ) female pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant Diabetes diagnosis type 1 , type 2 use insulin Under routine care physician diabetes treatment Able understand follow direction History compliance diabetes care regimen Able comply study requirement regard planned clinical visit exam In good physical condition without major medical concern blood chemistry abnormality Mental disorder might affect compliance protocol Diabetes diagnosis type 2 treatment involves ( 1 ) oral medication without insulin ( 2 ) insulin use restrict single daily injection longacting insulin ( 3 ) control diet/exercise regimen alone History intolerance sensitivity device material History adverse reaction allergy drugs/agents utilized study procedure History recurrent skin infection
